SELECT suo.org_id,suo.org_name FROM sys_user_org suo
suo.user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT}

SELECT re.* FROM ( SELECT sui.id, sui.user_account, sui.user_name, sui.email, sui.phone, sui.job_no, sui.address, sui.expiry_date_start, sui.expiry_date_end, sui.description, sui.STATUS, GROUP_CONCAT( sri.role_name ORDER BY sui.id SEPARATOR ' ' ) role_name, GROUP_CONCAT( va.area_name ORDER BY sui.id SEPARATOR ' ' ) area_name FROM sys_user_info sui LEFT JOIN sys_role_user sru ON sru.user_id = sui.id LEFT JOIN sys_role_info sri ON sri.id = sru.role_id LEFT JOIN role_video_area rva ON rva.role_id = sri.id LEFT JOIN video_area va ON va.id = rva.area_id GROUP BY sui.id ) re
sui.id = #{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT}

SELECT sui.id, sui.user_account, sui.user_name, sui.email, sui.phone, sui.job_no, sui.address, sui.expiry_date_start, sui.expiry_date_end, sui.description, sui.STATUS, GROUP_CONCAT( sri.role_name ORDER BY sui.id SEPARATOR '/' ) role_name, GROUP_CONCAT( va.area_name ORDER BY sui.id SEPARATOR '/' ) area_name FROM sys_user_info sui LEFT JOIN sys_role_user sru ON sru.user_id = sui.id LEFT JOIN sys_role_info sri ON sri.id = sru.role_id LEFT JOIN role_video_area rva ON rva.role_id = sri.id LEFT JOIN video_area va ON va.id = rva.area_id GROUP BY sui.id ORDER BY sui.id
